TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Camera extends Java.Lang.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class is obsoleted in this android platform")

Docs.summary: The Camera class is used to set image capture settings, start/stop preview, snap pictures, and retrieve frames for encoding for video.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: A new picture is taken by the camera, and the entry of the picture has been added to the media store.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: A new video is recorded by the camera, and the entry of the video has been added to the media store.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Lock() cil managed

Docs.summary: Re-locks the camera to prevent other processes from accessing it.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the camera cannot be re-locked (for example, if the camera is still in use by another process).

Docs.summary: Returns the number of physical cameras available on this device.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Android.Hardware.Camera Open() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new Camera object to access the first back-facing camera on the device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Android.Hardware.Camera Open(int32 cameraId) cil managed

Docs.param: the hardware camera to access, between 0 and -1.
Docs.summary: Creates a new Camera object to access a particular hardware camera.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if opening the camera fails (for example, if the camera is in use by another process or device policy manager has disabled the camera).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reconnect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reconnects to the camera service after another process used it.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if a connection cannot be re-established (for example, if the camera is still in use by another process).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Release() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disconnects and releases the Camera object resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StopPreview() cil managed
